import chardet

with open('data/ks_dataset.csv', 'rb') as f:
    result = chardet.detect(f.read(10000))  # Detect based on the first 10,000 bytes
print(result['encoding'])

                parse_dates=['deadline ', 'launched '],
                encoding=result['encoding'])
ks.head(6)
